short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Warn me when I'm about to create a service when I should create a lambda!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app reminds cosmos developers that they may be creating a service when they want to create a lambda component, it won't make much sense to the vast majority of people as cosmos is an application only in use in our organisation.
Creating a service is irreversible and prevents creation of a lambda of the same name.
